meeting_day_two-yes-start.text: Let the record show that Dr Pink has now joined the meeting
meeting_day_two-yes-start.speaker: magenta

meeting_day_two-yes-start.text: Unfortunately, Dr Green and Dr Red will not be joining us today
meeting_day_two-yes-start.speaker: magenta

meeting_day_two-yes-start.text: And Dr Yellow...?
meeting_day_two-yes-start.speaker: orange

meeting_day_two-yes-start.text: He resigned last night
meeting_day_two-yes-start.speaker: magenta

meeting_day_two-yes-start.text: Okay, look – I know what transpired yesterday with the crew of the Shepherd is probably on everyone's minds right now –
meeting_day_two-yes-start.speaker: blue

meeting_day_two-yes-start.text: Say their names
meeting_day_two-yes-start.speaker: mint

meeting_day_two-yes-start.text: Excuse me...?
meeting_day_two-yes-start.speaker: blue

meeting_day_two-yes-start.text: Say the names of the people who died for nothing because of your plan. Say at least one name
meeting_day_two-yes-start.speaker: mint

meeting_day_two-yes-start.text: Or do you not know any of their names? You don't, do you?
meeting_day_two-yes-start.speaker: mint

meeting_day_two-yes-start.text: Now that's just completely –
meeting_day_two-yes-start.speaker: blue

meeting_day_two-yes-start.text: Enough! Be quiet, both of you!
meeting_day_two-yes-start.speaker: orange

meeting_day_two-yes-start.text: I too am saddened by what happened yesterday, but the fate of our entire civilisation is at stake. We need to do something
meeting_day_two-yes-start.speaker: orange

meeting_day_two-yes-start.text: There's nothing to be done
meeting_day_two-yes-start.speaker: purple

meeting_day_two-yes-start.text: Now that's just unproductive!
meeting_day_two-yes-start.speaker: blue

meeting_day_two-yes-start.text: Dr Blue, in all your years of professional experience have you ever encountered a space rock capable of correcting its course once diverted?
meeting_day_two-yes-start.speaker: purple

meeting_day_two-yes-start.text: This is no ordinary moon. We meddle in matters beyond our understanding
meeting_day_two-yes-start.speaker: purple

meeting_day_two-yes-start.text: Well, that may be true... but Dr Purple, surely we have an obligation to try and stop it? Surely we have to try?
meeting_day_two-yes-start.speaker: mint

meeting_day_two-yes-start.text: It makes no significant difference
meeting_day_two-yes-start.speaker: purple

meeting_day_two-yes-start.text: God, I can't stand another word of this fatalist drivel!
meeting_day_two-yes-start.speaker: orange

meeting_day_two-yes-start.text: Come on, people – we're the world's foremost experts in our fields. Surely we can think of something!
meeting_day_two-yes-start.speaker: orange

meeting_day_two-yes-start.text: What if – what about the thing Red said yesterday?
meeting_day_two-yes-start.speaker: mint

meeting_day_two-yes-start.text: I don't recall
meeting_day_two-yes-start.speaker: blue

meeting_day_two-yes-start.text: You mean... "blow it to smithereens"?
meeting_day_two-yes-start.speaker: orange

meeting_day_two-yes-start.text: Yes, exactly! Why don't we just destroy the moon using some kind of explosives?
meeting_day_two-yes-start.speaker: mint

meeting_day_two-yes-start.text: "Why don't we"? Because it's never been attempted before, that's why. We have no idea what kind of results to expect
meeting_day_two-yes-start.speaker: blue

meeting_day_two-yes-start.text: Can it be any worse than the destruction of humanity?
meeting_day_two-yes-start.speaker: orange

meeting_day_two-yes-start.text: For all we know, it could accomplish the same result – debris from the moon would probably come crashing down and destroy the planet
meeting_day_two-yes-start.speaker: blue

meeting_day_two-yes-start.text: What choice do we have? Is it better to stand by and simply get obliterated?
meeting_day_two-yes-start.speaker: mint

meeting_day_two-yes-start.text: Pink – surely you agree that this is the correct course of action?
meeting_day_two-yes-start.speaker: mint

meeting_day_two-no-start.text: Let the record show that Dr Pink has now joined the meeting
meeting_day_two-no-start.speaker: magenta

meeting_day_two-no-start.text: Unfortunately, Dr Green and Dr Red will not be joining us today
meeting_day_two-no-start.speaker: magenta

meeting_day_two-no-start.text: And Dr Yellow...?
meeting_day_two-no-start.speaker: orange

meeting_day_two-no-start.text: He resigned last night
meeting_day_two-no-start.speaker: magenta

meeting_day_two-no-start.text: Forget them – we don't need them. All we need is a solid plan
meeting_day_two-no-start.speaker: mint

meeting_day_two-no-start.text: Oh, is that all? I daresay we had one yesterday until you shot it down
meeting_day_two-no-start.speaker: blue

meeting_day_two-no-start.text: Dr Blue, behave yourself!
meeting_day_two-no-start.speaker: magenta

meeting_day_two-no-start.text: I simply refuse to use human lives as instruments for our own means -- is that so difficult to understand?
meeting_day_two-no-start.speaker: mint

meeting_day_two-no-start.text: What exactly do you think is going to happen to the crew of the Shepherd once the moon collides with our planet?
meeting_day_two-no-start.speaker: blue

meeting_day_two-no-start.text: Even if their spacecraft isn't immediately incinerated –
meeting_day_two-no-start.speaker: blue

meeting_day_two-no-start.text: Enough! Be quiet, both of you!
meeting_day_two-no-start.speaker: orange

meeting_day_two-no-start.text: The fate of our entire civilisation is at stake. We need to do something
meeting_day_two-no-start.speaker: orange

meeting_day_two-no-start.text: There's nothing to be done
meeting_day_two-no-start.speaker: purple

meeting_day_two-no-start.text: Now that's just unproductive!
meeting_day_two-no-start.speaker: blue

meeting_day_two-no-start.text: This is no ordinary moon. We meddle in matters beyond our understanding
meeting_day_two-no-start.speaker: purple

meeting_day_two-no-start.text: Well, that may be true... but Dr Purple, surely we have an obligation to try and stop it? Surely we have to try?
meeting_day_two-no-start.speaker: mint

meeting_day_two-no-start.text: It makes no significant difference
meeting_day_two-no-start.speaker: purple

meeting_day_two-no-start.text: God, I can't stand another word of this fatalist drivel!
meeting_day_two-no-start.speaker: orange

meeting_day_two-no-start.text: Come on, people – we're the world's foremost experts in our fields. Surely we can think of something!
meeting_day_two-no-start.speaker: orange

meeting_day_two-no-start.text: What if – what about the thing Red said yesterday?
meeting_day_two-no-start.speaker: mint

meeting_day_two-no-start.text: I don't recall
meeting_day_two-no-start.speaker: blue

meeting_day_two-no-start.text: You mean... "blow it to smithereens"?
meeting_day_two-no-start.speaker: orange

meeting_day_two-no-start.text: Yes, exactly! Why don't we just destroy the moon using some kind of explosives?
meeting_day_two-no-start.speaker: mint

meeting_day_two-no-start.text: "Why don't we"? Because it's never been attempted before, that's why. We have no idea what kind of results to expect
meeting_day_two-no-start.speaker: blue

meeting_day_two-no-start.text: Can it be any worse than the destruction of humanity?
meeting_day_two-no-start.speaker: orange

meeting_day_two-no-start.text: For all we know, it could accomplish the same result – debris from the moon would probably come crashing down and destroy the planet
meeting_day_two-no-start.speaker: blue

meeting_day_two-no-start.text: What choice do we have? Is it better to stand by and simply get obliterated?
meeting_day_two-no-start.speaker: mint

meeting_day_two-no-start.text: Pink – surely you agree that this is the correct course of action?
meeting_day_two-no-start.speaker: mint

meeting_day_two-x-yes.text: This is a mistake. There must be a better way
meeting_day_two-x-yes.speaker: blue

meeting_day_two-x-yes.text: Well, unless you have something better... I think it's a promising plan
meeting_day_two-x-yes.speaker: orange

meeting_day_two-x-yes.text: As do I – I'll make the arrangements
meeting_day_two-x-yes.speaker: mint

meeting_day_two-x-no.text: Oh – thank you, Dr Pink. I didn't think you'd agree with me
meeting_day_two-x-no.speaker: blue

meeting_day_two-x-no.text: I hope you haven't doomed us all...
meeting_day_two-x-no.speaker: orange
